articles.description: Food writer Alison Roman accused Teigen of having people ‘run a content farm’ for her
articles.content:
Chrissy Teigen has said she was bummed out and felt crappy after reading critical comments by food columnist Alison Roman.
The food writer, whose work has appeared in the New York Times and Bon Appetit magazine, made a number of criticisms during an intervie… [+24398 chars]

articles.author: Roisin O'Connor
articles.title: Roy Horn death: Magician of famous duo Siegfried and Roy dies aged 75 from coronavirus - The Independent
articles.description: ‘Roy was a fighter his whole life including during these final days,’ his partner Siegfried Fischbacher said
articles.content:
Roy Horn, of the magic duo Siegfried & Roy, has died from coronavirus complications aged 75.
According to a statement released by his publicist, Dave Kirvin, Horn died on Friday 8 May in a Las Vegas hospital.
Today, the world has lost one of the greats … [+22906 chars]

articles.title: Gogglebox viewers disappointed by show's tribute to June Bernicoff following her death - Entertainment Daily
articles.description: June died on May 5
articles.content:
Viewers of Gogglebox were left slightly disappointed by the show's tribute to June Bernicoff following her death.
The sad news was confirmed in a statement by Goggleboxs Executive Producer, Tania Alexander, on Friday (May 8).
